name: Easily navigate pages on dashboard
author: Tristan Botly

sections.description:
Display a folder tree of your pages that is easy to expand and contract on your Dashboard. Designed for people that use WordPress as a content management system.

The idea came from developing a site with over 50 pages in multiple folders and it became impossible to follow which page was where in the folder structure.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress and that’s it ðŸ™‚
  3. You will be able to see the application displaying your pages on the dashboard ENJOY!

short_description: Displays a windows explorer style list of your pages on your Dashboard.
description:
Display a folder tree of your pages that is easy to expand and contract on your Dashboard. Designed for people that use WordPress as a content management system.

The idea came from developing a site with over 50 pages in multiple folders and it became impossible to follow which page was where in the folder structure.

screenshots.caption: The pages are now listed and managable through the dashboard administration interface.
